        Constructs a default CreditCardAccount

      • CreditCardAccount

        public CreditCardAccount​(java.lang.String name,
                         long number,
                         double balance)
        Constructs a CreditCardAccount with given name, account number, and balance. The APR and credit limit are set to default values.
        Parameters:
        name - name of account holder
        number - account number
        balance - amount of money in the account

      • CreditCardAccount

        public CreditCardAccount​(java.lang.String name,
                         long number,
                         double balance,
                         double apr,
                         double creditLimit)
        Constructs a CreditCardAccount with given name, account number, balance, APR, and credit limit
        Parameters:
        name - name of account holder
        number - account number
        balance - amount of money in the account
        apr - annual percentage rate for interest, as a decimal
        creditLimit - the credit limit for the card

        public void setApr​(double apr)

        apr - the new APR, as a decimal

        Parameters:
        creditLimit - the new credit limit
